# glTFMaterial — Property Reference
# glTF PBR material for web/game export workflows.
# Use with set_material_property / set_material_properties

## Base
baseColor : color                       # (color R G B) — base color
baseColorMap : texturemap               # texture slot
metalness : float                       # 0.0-1.0
metalnessMap : texturemap
roughness : float                       # 0.0 = mirror
roughnessMap : texturemap

## Alpha / Opacity
alphaMode : integer                     # 0=Opaque, 1=Blend, 2=Mask
AlphaMap : texturemap
alphaCutoff : float                     # mask threshold

## Normal
normal : float                          # normal strength
normalMap : texturemap

## Occlusion
ambientOcclusion : float
ambientOcclusionMap : texturemap

## Emission
emissionColor : color
emissionMap : texturemap

## Clearcoat (KHR_materials_clearcoat)
enableClearCoat : boolean               # must enable first
clearcoat : float
clearcoatMap : texturemap
clearcoatRoughness : float
clearcoatRoughnessMap : texturemap
clearcoatNormal : float
clearcoatNormalMap : texturemap

## Sheen (KHR_materials_sheen)
enableSheen : boolean                   # must enable first
sheenColor : color
sheenColorMap : texturemap
sheenRoughness : float
sheenRoughnessMap : texturemap

## Specular (KHR_materials_specular)
enableSpecular : boolean                # must enable first
Specular : float
specularMap : texturemap
specularcolor : color
specularColorMap : texturemap

## Transmission (KHR_materials_transmission)
enableTransmission : boolean            # must enable first
transmission : float
transmissionMap : texturemap

## Volume (KHR_materials_volume)
enableVolume : boolean                  # must enable first
volumeThickness : float
volumeThicknessMap : texturemap
volumeDistance : float
volumeColor : color

## IOR (KHR_materials_ior)
enableIndexOfRefraction : boolean       # must enable first
indexOfRefraction : float

## Options
DoubleSided : boolean
unlit : boolean                         # KHR_materials_unlit
